DOC.brief_summary: This randomize clinical trial study feasibility tailor physical activity intervention administer use Interactive Voice Response technology cell phone . Interactive voice response health coach support may motivate overweight postmenopausal woman stick exercise regimen reduce risk get breast cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Communication & Peer Support Effects Physical Activity Overweight Postmenopausal Women
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To design , develop test feasibility implement physical activity intervention use tailored communication Interactive Voice Response ( IVR ) technology . We address four basic question accomplish aim : 1 . Among overweight , postmenopausal woman , pas screening criterion , percentage woman willing participate 12-week physical activity intervention include two 1-mile walk test two visit General Clinical Research Center ( GCRC ) ? 2 . After begin study , proportion woman use cell phone land line least 5 day week get physical activity intervention message ? 3 . How many participant enrol participate study end 12-week intervention period ? 4 . On average , many step per day participant walk ? How many participant reach 10,000 steps-per-day target end 12 week-intervention ? SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . The effectiveness ( satisfaction , convenience , ease operation ) material process . II . Examine whether social support health coach result improvement measure adherence satisfaction . III . Examine correlation self-reported step per day improvement performance 1-mile walk test administer begin end 12-week intervention . OUTLINE : Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . ARM I. COACH-CONDITION : Participants participate 12-week physical activity program ( walk program ) receive health mail message via IVR system health coach . Participants arm study , interact IVR system option interact health coach . ARM II : NO-COACH CONDITION : Participants participate 12-week physical activity program ( walk program ) administer use IVR system .
DOC.criteria: Present letter/documentation primary physician state participate physical activity program require walk 10,000 step per day Have body mass index ( BMI ) 25 40 kg/m^2 ( inclusive ) Be postmenopausal , define period 12 month age 55 , period 12 month ; also , woman ovary remove consider postmenopausal Willing participate wellness program last 12 week involve walk least 30 minute day day Has access cell phone 12week intervention Functional knowledge English ( ability read write ) Taking hormone replacement therapy within 3 month enrollment Taking Tamoxifen Raloxifene within 3 month enrollment Enrolled weight management program , Weight Watchers Engaged regular , plan walk least 30 minute day Previous history breast cancer Premenopausal Age > 75 year , minimize comorbidities Can walk one mile
